regex.expres: #$pyFunction import requests, re def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'https://www.skylinewebcams.com[list2.param1]'): headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0','Referer': 'https://www.skylinewebcams.com'} source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) m3u8sX = re.findall(',url:.*?([^\']+)', source.text)[0] return m3u8sX + '|headers'
